item.description:
surf lesson for those interested in joining in on a group lesson. more details to follow.

Cost: $30

if you are using gps to get here, the address is a little tricky. gps will tell you that you are arriving way before you actually get there, not sure why. so anyway, zapstix is on your left if you are coming from the south. right next to preston realty and Ceal's clam stand. If you see the lanes switch from 2 to 1 lane and you approach the drawbridge, you have gone to far.
item.name: Surf Lesson for the newbies
